alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wayne County through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Salem to near Wooster. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wooster, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Creston, Dalton, West Salem, Smithville, Clinton, Apple Creek, Marshallville, Burbank and Congress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
